comments:
Build ID: I20070625-1500

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Install Target Management (http://www.eclipse.org/dsdp/tm/) and create a new (linux/ssh) connection in the Remote Systems Explorer
2. Back in the PHP perspective do, in the project: New > Folder
3. Advanced > [x] Link to folder in the file system
4. Choose file system: RSE
5. Choose the folder to import/link (from your remote connection)
6. Try to open a PHP file


More information:
I submitted another NullPointerException the other day which was fixed in the CVS. I downloaded the latest N20070821 and that one was indeed fixed (I could open my interface now without an exception being thrown). However today when fiddling around with remote editing I encountered this second one. I first encountered the bug while running I20070816, due to the other NullPointer being fixed I updated to the CVS build.

The plain Text Editor and the Java Editors have no problem opening the remote file.

Regards,

Marijn.

Sorry, I forgot to paste the actual exception, here it is:
